data.description: extract data from nessus nbe files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module has been designed to parse a specific set of data,
    namely, nessus nbe files. Therefore, Parse::NessusNBE seems
    appropriate. Additional modules I create, for specific nessus file
    formats, could easily follow a similiar convention, e.g.
    Parse::NessusXML for nessus xml data and Parse::NessusENX for the
    nessusWX export file format.
